profile.name: Nidhi Joshi

ecommerce-platform.title: E-Commerce Platform
ecommerce-platform.description: A full-stack e-commerce solution built with React and TypeScript, featuring real-time inventory management, secure payment processing, and an intuitive admin dashboard.
ecommerce-platform.image: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 800 600'%3E%3Crect width='800' height='600' fill='%23667eea'/%3E%3Crect x='100' y='100' width='600' height='400' fill='white'/%3E%3Crect x='150' y='150' width='200' height='150' fill='%23667eea'/%3E%3Crect x='400' y='150' width='250' height='150' fill='%23667eea'/%3E%3Crect x='150' y='330' width='500' height='100' fill='%23667eea'/%3E%3Ccircle cx='650' cy='80' r='30' fill='%23f5a623'/%3E%3C/svg%3E

dashboard-analytics.title: Analytics Dashboard
dashboard-analytics.description: An interactive data visualization dashboard with real-time updates, custom chart configurations, and export capabilities for business intelligence.
dashboard-analytics.image: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 800 600'%3E%3Crect width='800' height='600' fill='%232ecc71'/%3E%3Cpolyline points='100,450 200,350 300,380 400,250 500,300 600,200 700,250' fill='none' stroke='white' stroke-width='15'/%3E%3Ccircle cx='100' cy='450' r='10' fill='white'/%3E%3Ccircle cx='200' cy='350' r='10' fill='white'/%3E%3Ccircle cx='300' cy='380' r='10' fill='white'/%3E%3Ccircle cx='400' cy='250' r='10' fill='white'/%3E%3Ccircle cx='500' cy='300' r='10' fill='white'/%3E%3Ccircle cx='600' cy='200' r='10' fill='white'/%3E%3Ccircle cx='700' cy='250' r='10' fill='white'/%3E%3C/svg%3E

mobile-app.title: Mobile Banking App
mobile-app.description: A secure mobile banking application with biometric authentication, transaction history, bill payments, and real-time account notifications.
mobile-app.image: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 800 600'%3E%3Crect width='800' height='600' fill='%23e74c3c'/%3E%3Crect x='250' y='50' width='300' height='500' rx='30' fill='white'/%3E%3Crect x='280' y='100' width='240' height='200' fill='%23e74c3c'/%3E%3Ccircle cx='400' cy='400' r='40' fill='%23e74c3c'/%3E%3C/svg%3E

design-system.title: Design System
design-system.description: A comprehensive design system with reusable components, accessibility guidelines, and documentation for consistent UI development across projects.
design-system.image: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 800 600'%3E%3Crect width='800' height='600' fill='%23f5a623'/%3E%3Crect x='100' y='150' width='200' height='300' fill='white'/%3E%3Crect x='350' y='150' width='200' height='300' fill='white'/%3E%3Ccircle cx='200' cy='250' r='40' fill='%23f5a623'/%3E%3Ccircle cx='450' cy='350' r='40' fill='%23f5a623'/%3E%3C/svg%3E

api-gateway.title: API Gateway
api-gateway.description: A scalable API gateway managing authentication, rate limiting, request routing, and microservices orchestration for enterprise applications.
api-gateway.image: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 800 600'%3E%3Crect width='800' height='600' fill='%234a90e2'/%3E%3Crect x='200' y='150' width='400' height='300' fill='white'/%3E%3Cpath d='M250 300 L400 200 L550 300 L400 400 Z' fill='%234a90e2'/%3E%3Ccircle cx='400' cy='300' r='60' fill='white'/%3E%3C/svg%3E

portfolio-v3.title: Portfolio v3
portfolio-v3.description: A responsive portfolio website showcasing projects, skills, and experience with modern design patterns and optimal performance.
portfolio-v3.image: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 800 600'%3E%3Crect width='800' height='600' fill='%239b59b6'/%3E%3Crect x='150' y='100' width='500' height='400' fill='white'/%3E%3Crect x='200' y='150' width='120' height='90' fill='%239b59b6'/%3E%3Crect x='350' y='150' width='250' height='90' fill='%239b59b6'/%3E%3Crect x='200' y='270' width='400' height='50' fill='%239b59b6'/%3E%3Crect x='200' y='350' width='400' height='50' fill='%239b59b6'/%3E%3C/svg%3E

task-manager.title: Task Manager
task-manager.description: A productivity app with task organization, deadline tracking, team collaboration features, and offline support as a Progressive Web App.

landing-page.title: Landing Page
landing-page.description: A high-converting landing page with A/B testing capabilities, analytics integration, and optimized SEO for maximum visibility.
landing-page.image: data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 800 600'%3E%3Crect width='800' height='600' fill='%23e67e22'/%3E%3Crect x='100' y='80' width='600' height='440' fill='white'/%3E%3Ctext x='400' y='280' font-size='80' fill='%23e67e22' text-anchor='middle'%3EHello%3C/text%3E%3Ctext x='400' y='380' font-size='80' fill='%23e67e22' text-anchor='middle'%3EWorld%3C/text%3E%3C/svg%3E

chat-app.title: Real-time Chat App
chat-app.description: A real-time messaging application with group chats, file sharing, message encryption, and cross-platform support.
